headline: PhD candidate in Mechanical Engineering at University of Connecticut
bioMarkdown:
Hi, I'm Zhiling Chenüëã, a third-year Mechanical Engineering PhD student at ![UConn Logo](/icon/uconn_logo.png) [University of Connecticut](https://me.engr.uconn.edu/) and a research assistant at [Intelligent Systems and Control Laboratory (ISCL)](https://imani.lab.uconn.edu/), , where I am advised by Dr. [Farhad Imani](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=XIdSChwAAAAJ&hl=en) and Dr. [Ruimin Chen](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=ScPyaK0AAAAJ&hl=en). 

üî¨ **Research Interests:** Embodied Inspection, Robotic Manufacturing.
